thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Clovis Oncology Receives Positive Trend Vote In European Regulatory Review Ovarian Cancer Treatment

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Clovis Oncology Receives Positive Trend Vote In European Regulatory Review Ovarian Cancer Treatment
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Clovis Oncology Inc:
* CLOVIS ONCOLOGY RECEIVES POSITIVE TREND VOTE FROM CHMP IN EUROPEAN REGULATORY REVIEW FOR RUCAPARIB OVARIAN CANCER TREATMENT INDICATION
* CLOVIS ONCOLOGY INC - PENDING A POSITIVE RECOMMENDATION BY CHMP FOR RUCAPARIB TABLETS, FINAL APPROVAL BY EUROPEAN COMMISSION WOULD FOLLOW IN Q2 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
